pr_title: Enable publishing to main maven repo instead of test

timeline.message:
Enable publishing to main maven repo instead of test

- The new pipeline has been verified, so we can enable publishing to the
  main maven repo in the linkedin bintray acct instead of the test repo.
- Remove scripts/artifacts related to old release pipeline (shipkit
  plugin)
- Add metadata to maven pom from old shipkit pom: license, scm, issues, CI

timeline.author: mockitoguy
